message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I'm confident you'll find it to be a great addition to your collection. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1300000.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product you're selling, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $1200000 for it. Would you consider adjusting your price accordingly?
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was hoping we could meet in the middle. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1250000.
